text: Ixora calycina is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Ixora calycina. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. Downloaded on 22 November 2015. ==References== ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae calycina Category:Endemic flora of Sri Lanka Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
